general.title: Something went wrong
general.description: We're sorry, an unexpected error occurred.

network.title: Network Error
network.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

chapter_not_found.title: Chapter Not Found
chapter_not_found.description: The chapter you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.

timeline_not_found.title: Timeline Not Found
timeline_not_found.description: This timeline doesn't exist or is not available.

access_denied.title: Access Denied
access_denied.description: You don't have permission to access this resource.

server_error.title: Server Error
server_error.description: Our servers are experiencing issues. Please try again later.
